original_text: Then the Nazirite must stand at the place where people go into the Tent of Meeting. He must remove all the hair from his head. He must put his hair into the same fire where the priest has cooked the friendship offering.
korean_text: 자기의 몸을 구별한 나실인은 회막 문에서 자기의 머리털을 밀고 그것을 화목제물 밑에 있는 불에 둘지며

sentences.original_text: at the place where people go into the Tent of Meeting
He must remove all the hair from his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 머리의 모든 머리카락을 제거해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must put his hair into the same fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 머리카락을 같은 불속에 넣어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: where the priest has cooked the friendship offering
